brainly_data.question: What do you use to make an inference in biology?
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.question: What do you use to make an inference in biology?
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text: The term "inference" refers to the process of using observation and background knowledge as well as other known premises to determine a conclusion that makes sense.

top_answer.subject: Biology
top_answer.text: The term "inference" refers to the process of using observation and background knowledge as well as other known premises to determine a conclusion that makes sense.
